程序包 com.google.typography.font.tools.fontinfo

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CommandOptions  
    DataDisplayTable
    A row-oriented table of strings with labeled columns that is intended to be displayed by an application.
    FontInfo
    Class of static functions that return information about a given font
    FontInfoMain
    This is the main class for the command-line version of the font info tool
    FontUtils
    Font Utility functions
    UnicodeBlockData
    Class containing functions that return information about Unicode blocks Unicode block information listed is for Unicode version 6.1.0 and is retrieved from ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/6.1.0/ucd/Blocks.txt
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    DataDisplayTable.Align
    Enum representing the alignment of the text when being displayed
